newProperties.name: Title
newProperties.description: The title of the podcast/channel/show. RSS: <channel><title>

newProperties.name: Description
newProperties.description: Description of the Podcast. Equivalent to <itunes:summary>. RSS: <channel><description> OR <channel><itunes:summary>

newProperties.name: Image
newProperties.description: URL to podcast thumbnail: NOTE: Artwork must be a minimum size of 1400 x 1400 pixels and a maximum size of 3000 x 3000 pixels, in JPEG or PNG format, 72 dpi, with appropriate file extensions (.jpg, .png), and in the RGB colorspace. Equivalent to <itunes:image>. RSS: <channel><image><url> OR <channel><itunes:image>

newProperties.name: Two letter Language code
newProperties.description: The language specified in the podcast. RSS: <channel><language>

newProperties.name: Language in English
newProperties.description: The language(s) used in the podcast. Stated in English.

newProperties.name: Link
newProperties.description: A link to a website or social media page for the podcast. RSS: <channel><link>

newProperties.name: Author
newProperties.description: The author of the podcast. Equivalent to <managingEditor> and <itunes:author>. RSS: <channel><managingEditor> OR <channel><itunes:author>

newProperties.name: Owner name
newProperties.description: The name of the owner of the podcast. Equivalent to <itunes:name>. RSS: <channel><itunes:owner><itunes:name>

newProperties.name: Owner email
newProperties.description: The contact email of the podcast owner. Equivalent to <itunes:email>. RSS: <channel><itunes:owner><itunes:email>

newProperties.name: Subtitle
newProperties.description: A short description of the podcast. Equivalent to <itunes:subtitle>. RSS: <channel><itunes:subtitle>

newProperties.name: Podcast category
newProperties.description: The categories as defined for podcasts published in itunes. RSS: <channel><itunes:category>

newProperties.name: Contributors
newProperties.description: Address(es) of outside contributors to this channel

newProperties.name: Revenue sink
newProperties.description: The address where the revenue generated by the channel should be transferred

newProperties.name: Explicit
newProperties.description: Indicates whether your podcast contains explicit material. You can specify the following values:. RSS: <channel><itunes:explicit>
